## Code with error
```Python
def add_one(number):
    return number + 1

print(f"1 + 1 = {add_one(1)}")
print(f"1 + 'error' = {add_one('error')}")
```
```
1 + 1 = 2
```
```
TypeError: can only concatenate str (not "int") to str
```
